metadata.subject: Analysis of Special Counsel's Strategy for Indicting President Trump

organizations: U.S. House Committee on Oversight and Accountability
House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence

relationships.description: President being investigated by Special Counsel for obstruction of justice
President fired FBI Director and allegedly requested loyalty pledges
Deputy Attorney General oversees and must approve Special Counsel's actions
President allegedly promised protection to former National Security Advisor

analysis.purpose: To reveal the Special Counsel's strategy for indicting President Trump for obstruction of justice and analyze the constitutional crisis
analysis.significance: Provides rare insight into Mueller's investigation strategy and the potential for unprecedented legal confrontation between Special Counsel and President

concerns: Potential obstruction of justice by President

notable_quotes: "Robert Mueller and his office are preparing for a life or death confrontation with the President and the mother of all constitutional crises."
"This indictment could have been drafted without anyone being interviewed... it takes well covered public events and moves them to a set of circumstantial conclusions."
"Bob Mueller is all about limits and rules. Donald Trump has none and acknowledges none."
red_flags: President allegedly directing others to lie to FBI
Attempts to interfere with ongoing investigations

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail or coercion found in this analytical document

illegal_activity.description: This is an analytical news article discussing alleged illegal activities by others (President Trump and associates), not first-hand evidence of crimes being committed

details: Document appears to be written by a journalist/researcher working on a book
References to news outlets reporting on investigation developments
Analysis of media strategy and public perception

public_knowledge.context: This document discusses the Mueller investigation which was extensively covered in media, though it claims to reveal previously unknown strategic details

analysis.summary: This analytical document reveals the Special Counsel's strategy for indicting President Trump for obstruction of justice, detailing a timeline of alleged obstructive acts and the legal theories supporting presidential indictment. It describes an impending constitutional crisis between Mueller's investigation and the White House, with both sides preparing for a Supreme Court battle over presidential powers and immunity.
